experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis phloem from Altered Phloem Development (APL) mutants and wild type controls

description.text: We profiled transcripts from sorted phloem cells of wild-type and apl mutants to identify the genes regulated by APL in phloem. We profiled transcripts from sorted phloem cells of wild-type and apl mutants to identify the genes regulated by APL in phloem. Three biological replicates for control WT and apl mutants were used in thes study. Root tissue was protoplasted and sorted using fluorescence-activated cell sorting (FACS). Total RNA was extracted from GFP+ protoplasts.

bibliography.authors: Furuta KM, Yadav SR, Lehesranta S, Belevich I, Miyashima S, Heo JO, Vatén A, Lindgren O, De Rybel B, Van Isterdael G, Somervuo P, Lichtenberger R, Rocha R, Thitamadee S, Tähtiharju S, Auvinen P, Beeckman T, Jokitalo E, Helariutta Y
bibliography.title: Plant development. Arabidopsis NAC45/86 direct sieve element morphogenesis culminating in enucleation.
